item.title: Jessie add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "That's why I want you there, he said. You're unpredictable, and that can be the difference between success and failure. Most people make decisions in anger, fear, love, or obligation. You make decisions to irritate people." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "Hey, ah, does anyone want a cookie or something? Oh yeah. A cookie. That would make everything better. Dunked in a shot of tequila , maybe? Or better yet, just the bottle? Yeah, that ought to do it." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "Plan B?' Ivy said. 'What is plan B?' Jenks reddened. 'Grab the fish and run like hell,' he muttered, and I almost giggled." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Hereâ€™s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Bobbie Ann Mason
item.description: "One day I was counting the cats and I absent-mindedly counted myself." -- Bobbie Ann Mason

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "It's like learning to ride a unicorn. You never forget." -- Eoin Colfer
